How-can-we-run-JS-on-our-laptop?_key1: You will need to install Node to run JS on your laptop. Without Node we can not run our js `code` on our laptop.
How-can-we-run-JS-on-our-laptop?_key2: Node js is an environment to run javascript `code` outside a web browser. Like in our laptops.
How-can-we-run-JS-on-our-laptop?_key3: Here are instruction on how to install Node in Windows.
How-can-we-run-JS-on-our-laptop?_key4: Here are the instructions on how to install Node in Ubuntu
How-can-we-run-JS-on-our-laptop?_key5: Follow this link for installing node in Ubuntu .
How-can-we-run-JS-on-our-laptop?_key12: You can directly open your `terminal` by pressing ctrl+Alt+T and run these below given command for installing node in your Ubuntu installed laptops.
How-can-we-run-JS-on-our-laptop?_key17: After installing these commands you will get installed by node in your laptop and also npm in your laptop.
How-can-we-run-JS-on-our-laptop?_key23: Press "control" + "shift"+ "tilt"(~) on your `key`board. It will show the `terminal` in vs `code`.
How-can-we-run-JS-on-our-laptop?_key24: `Execute` this `file` (js `file`) by typing **node hello.js** and you will see **Hello JS** on the screen.
How-can-we-run-JS-on-our-laptop?_key25: Successfully you created a file and ran it, happy coding. …….
